message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 80% and you can have 20%.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the inflation advantage I get in later rounds. Let's see if you're willing to negotiate.
I'm not willing to give up 55% of the initial amount. I'll need a better deal to make it worth my while.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal to account for the inflation. Let's see if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
